primary.context: Caller wanted to pay maintenance fees over the phone
primary.detail: The AI offered a payment link, but the caller requested to pay over the phone, which is out-of-scope for the AI, leading to a transfer.

steps: Caller requested to make a maintenance payment.
Agent offered to send a payment link via text or email.
Caller refused the link and requested to pay over the phone.
Agent transferred the caller to the concierge department.
Caller remained in the hold queue for over 25 minutes.

actions.detail: Offered payment link via text or email
Transferred to concierge per customer request

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a maintenance payment but specifically requested to do so over the phone rather than using a link. The AI correctly identified the out-of-scope request for phone processing and transferred the caller to the concierge department.
insights.verbatim: No. On the phone. I'm gonna call and make it over the phone payment.
